text: @realDonaldTrump Since you assigned PENCE the coronavirus czar and all communications must go through him for approval, I guess I can go ahead and assume anywhere from 7 to 10 million dead americans due to your desire to cover it up rather than address it. Hence, the biggest dow point drop ever.

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
